I'm a dad, hiker, canoe paddler, bluegrass musician, software engineer, commercial and research drone pilot, technical generalist, and tinkerer. He/him.

Professionally I focus specialize in aviation, geospatial, and cybersecurity. I prioritize open source, knowledge, and supportive communities.

Software engineering at Mosaic ATM (Washtington, DC), drone and consulting work at Twomile (Ohio), academics at Lakeland Community College (Ohio).

Palestine is genocide. Trump is a fascist.
